original_title: Flame Still Burns - A Dive Into the Paris Hardcore Scene
overview: FLAME STILL BURNS is a documentary about the parisian booming hardcore scene, from the ashes of Covid to sold-out venues. But can this overflowing enthusiasm be enough in the face of an economy in crisis, venues shutting down and inflation? Can the flame still burn through it all?
title: Flame Still Burns - A Dive Into the Paris Hardcore Scene
